text: geudeul-eun jangsana olag-eul boass-eul ttae geujjog-eulo tteol-eojyeo nagamyeo geudae(muhammadeu)leul seo issneun chaelo namgyeonoh-assnola. geudaeneun malhala : ‘hananimkkeseo gajigo gyesin geosdeul-i olagboda geuligo jangsaboda deo joh-eun geos-ila. hananimkkeseoneun yangsig-eul jegonghaneun jadeul jung-eseo eutteum-isin bun-ila’
